name: Pataro
description:
This game was made based on Pataro, a modern C++ roguelike game engine I'm making on my free time, based around statistics you get at the end. Just for the fun of getting big numbers in a very simple roguelike.

It's very basic and simple as it was my first roguelike but I was more focused on getting a clean code and an extendable architecture, so it's a win-win to me!

Controls

- Move around using the arrows
- Grab an object from the floor (you must step on it) with G
- Open your inventory with I
